        public Tracker newTracker(String trackerUrl,
                 int siteId,
                 String authToken)
                   throws MalformedURLException
        Parameters:
        trackerUrl - (required) Tracking HTTP API endpoint, for example, http://your-piwik-domain.tld/piwik.php
        siteId - (required) id of site
        authToken - (optional) could be null or valid auth token. @deprecated since Piwik 2.8.
        Returns:
        Tracker object
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException

      • setDryRun

        public void setDryRun(boolean dryRun)
        The dryRun flag set to true prevents any data from being sent to Piwik. The dryRun flag should be set whenever you are testing or debugging an implementation and do not want test data to appear in your Piwik reports. To set the dry run flag, use:

        Piwik.getInstance(this).setDryRun(true);
